description:
Akari has the day to herself! She and President Aria travel all over town, meeting new people and eating strange yet wonderful food. Suddenly, Akatsuki spots them traipsing around, and without realizing why, he starts to follow them...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sono Choppiri Himitsu no Basho ni...
そのちょっぴり秘密の場所に...
